001package org.gbif.predicate.query;
002
003import java.util.List;
004import java.util.Optional;
005import org.elasticsearch.common.Strings;
006import org.elasticsearch.index.query.QueryBuilder;
007import org.elasticsearch.index.query.RangeQueryBuilder;
008import org.elasticsearch.search.sort.FieldSortBuilder;
009import org.gbif.api.model.common.search.SearchParameter;
010import org.gbif.api.model.predicate.SimplePredicate;
011
012public interface EsFieldMapper<P extends SearchParameter> {
013
014  String getVerbatimFieldName(P searchParameter);
015
016  String getExactMatchFieldName(P searchParameter);
017
018  String getGeoDistanceField();
019
020  String getGeoShapeField();
021
022  String getSearchFieldName(P searchParameter);
023
024  boolean isVocabulary(P searchParameter);
025
026  String getChecklistField(String checklistKey, P searchParameter);
027
028  String getNestedPath(P searchParameter);
029
030  String getFullTextField();
031
032  List<FieldSortBuilder> getDefaultSort();
033
034  default Optional<QueryBuilder> getDefaultFilter() {
035    return Optional.empty();
036  }
037
038  default boolean isNestedField(P searchParameter) {
039    return !Strings.isNullOrEmpty(getNestedPath(searchParameter));
040  }
041
042  /**
043   * Returns true if the search parameter is taxonomic related and hence will be determined by which
044   * checklist is in use.
045   *
046   * @param searchParameter
047   * @return true if a taxonomic parameter
048   */
049  boolean isTaxonomic(P searchParameter);
050
051  /**
052   * Adds an "is null" filter if the mapper instructs to do it for the specific predicate. Used
053   * mostly in range queries to give specific semantics to null values.
054   */
055  default boolean includeNullInPredicate(SimplePredicate<P> predicate) {
056    return false;
057  }
058
059  /**
060   * Adds an "is null" filter if the mapper instructs to do it for the range query. Used mostly in
061   * range queries to give specific semantics to null values.
062   */
063  default boolean includeNullInRange(P param, RangeQueryBuilder rangeQueryBuilder) {
064    return false;
065  }
066
067  EsField getEsField(P parameter);
068
069  EsField getEsFacetField(P parameter);
070
071  boolean isDateField(EsField esField);
072
073  EsField getGeoDistanceEsField();
074
075  EsField getGeoShapeEsField();
076}
